courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Learn to play the guitar from scratch with step-by-step lessons on chords, strumming, and basic songs.

courses.title: Mastering Piano: From Basics to Pro
courses.description: Comprehensive piano course covering music theory, scales, and advanced techniques.

courses.title: Singing Lessons for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of vocal training, breathing techniques, and pitch control.

courses.title: Music Production with FL Studio
courses.description: Learn music production and beat-making using FL Studio from scratch.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of drumming, including rhythms, beats, and fills.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation with scales, licks, and techniques for beginners.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to create electronic music, mix tracks, and produce high-quality EDM.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your violin skills with advanced techniques, including vibrato and double stops.

courses.title: Music Theory Made Easy
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, scales, chords, and songwriting.

courses.title: DJ Mixing and Scratching
courses.description: Learn to mix tracks, scratch, and perform live DJ sets with confidence.
